description: An Electronic Engineer at PT Bitratex Industries plays a critical role in ensuring smooth production operations by maintaining automation systems and performing regular replacement of spare parts. Key responsibilities include diagnosing issues, troubleshooting, and repairing electronic equipment to minimize production downtime. The engineer is also responsible for monitoring and calibrating sensors on machinery to ensure process accuracy and consistent product quality. Furthermore, the role requires strict adherence to electrical safety standards and compliance with industry regulations to maintain a safe and efficient working environment.

As an Administratition, the responsibilities include submitting draft work plans and budgets to support effective organizational planning and resource allocation. The role also involves preparing and submitting financial reports and accountability documents to ensure transparency in task implementation. Additionally, the officer is responsible for maintaining an accurate register of members and administrators, as well as carrying out systematic bookkeeping and financial inventory to uphold proper financial management and compliance with organizational policies.
